speak;Kyle;Your form has improved, Amelia.|But you're still leaving your left flank exposed.
speak;Amelia;I'm trying to be quicker on my fee!.|Heavy armor slows me down too much, though...
speak;Kyle;In real combat, that speed won't matter if a lance finds that gap.
speak;Amelia;But... Sir Kyle...|I've noticed you take hits directly to your breastplate.
speak;Kyle;A knight must be the wall between danger and those he protects.|Direct confrontation is our duty.
speak;Amelia;Doesn't that... hurt?|Even with armor, the impact must be tremendous!
expression;Kyle;ClosedEyes
speak;Kyle;Pain is temporary.|Failing in your duty is permanent.
speak;Amelia;... though... there's that thing you do with your armor, yeah?|The angle, I mean!|You deflect blows slightly, instead of taking them straight on.
expression;Kyle;NormalBlink
speak;Kyle;You have a good eye.|It's a technique passed down through Renais knights.
speak;Amelia;Could you... show me?|Even if my armor's not that heavy...|Yeah, I can make it work!
speak;Kyle;Stand here.|Now, position your shoulder guard at this angle...
speak;Amelia;Like this?
speak;Kyle;Better.|The impact distributes across the surface instead of concentrating in one spot.
speak;Amelia;I see!|And if I combine this with my footwork...
speak;Kyle;Interesting approach.|You wouldn't need to sacrifice mobility.
speak;Amelia;Are you supposed to?
speak;Kyle;I usually do. But...|Your agility might serve you better than my methods.|Have you considered using that speed for positioning?
speak;Amelia;What do you mean?
speak;Kyle;Anticipate the blow.|Shift your weight to guide the impact where your armor is strongest.
speak;Amelia;So instead of avoiding completely...|I direct where the hit lands!
speak;Kyle;Precisely.|It merges your style with traditional armor techniques.
speak;Amelia;Thank you, Sir Kyle!|I'll practice this right away.
speak;Kyle;And perhaps...|I could learn something from your footwork.
